rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2986, 3462, P4001.2, P6002, P6003}

description: This unit will review normal anatomy and physiology of the skin and explore the wound healing process in detail, including the differences between acute and chronic wound healing. Furthermore, it will examine factors that enhance, inhibit or delay wound healing including nutrition, medications, smoking, perfusion and co-morbidities.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
